name: discontentedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone feels unhappy because they are not satisfied with something: Grandfather shook his head discontentedly. Her only response was to grunt discontentedly. See
discontent
More examplesFewer examplesHe picked at the food on his plate, muttering discontentedly.Sam shrugged discontentedly.I looked discontentedly at myself in the mirror.
